Properties.ProtectedString:
ball = script.Parent damage = 10
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
--myAngVel = ball.BodyAngularVelocity --local noMoreCollision = false
local touchConnection = nil
function onTouched(hit) --if noMoreCollision then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil and hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("FreezeRayIceCube") == nil then -- noMoreCollision = true touchConnection:disconnect() tagHumanoid(humanoid) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) untagHumanoid(humanoid)
-- freeze them too! :D iceCube = Instance.new("Part") iceCube.Name = "FreezeRayIceCube"
iceCube.Size = Vector3.new(5, 10, 5) iceCube.CFrame = hit.Parent.Torso.CFrame iceCube.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Cyan") iceCube.TopSurface = 0 iceCube.BottomSurface = 0
iceWeld = Instance.new("Weld") iceWeld.Part0 = iceCube iceWeld.Part1 = hit.Parent.Torso iceWeld.C1 = CFrame.new() iceWeld.Parent = iceCube
iceCube.Transparency = 0.5 iceCube.Parent = hit.Parent humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0
frostyTag = Instance.new("NumberValue") frostyTag.Name = "FrostyValue" frostyTag.Value = 1 frostyTag.Parent = hit.Parent
iceCube.CanCollide = true HitSound:Play()
-- below line must be BEFORE frostyTag, or it will fail? ball.Parent = nil
frostyTag.Changed:connect( function () print("Changed is being called")
--if numba <= 0 then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 iceCube:remove() --iceCube:remove() --frostyTag:remove() --end end)
print("well, we at least got here")
wait(10) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 iceCube:remove() frostyTag:remove() else
HitSound:Play() ball.Parent = nil
end
end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid) -- todo: make tag expire local tag = ball:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then local new_tag = tag:clone() new_tag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
touchConnection = ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
wait(4) --myAngVel.angularvelocity = 20*ball.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 0, 1)).unit --ball.SparkSound.Looped = false --ball.SparkSound:Stop() ball.Parent = nil

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true
--local spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") local spark = Instance.new("Smoke") spark.Color = Color3.new(0,.5,1) spark.RiseVelocity = 5 spark.Size = 1 spark.Name = "IceFog"
function fire(v)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local missile = Instance.new("Part")
spark:Clone().Parent = missile
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + (v * 15)
missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos,spawnPos+v) missile.Position = spawnPos missile.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,15) missile.Velocity = v * 100 missile.RotVelocity = 20*(missile.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0,0,1)).unit) --spinspinspin, spinspinspin --missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(1020) missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Toothpaste") missile.Shape = 1 --0 is ball, 1 is block missile.BottomSurface = 0 missile.TopSurface = 0 missile.Name = "Spark" missile.Reflectance = .5
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") --force.force = Vector3.new(0,98,0) force.force = Vector3.new(0, 196*missile:GetMass(), 0) --anti-grav it force.Parent = missile
--local angVel = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") --angVel.P = 1000 --angVel.maxTorque = Vector3.new(angVel.P, angVel.P, angVel.P) --angVel.angularvelocity = 10*missile.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)).unit --angVel.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local new_script = script.Parent.LaserBlast:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
local PewPew = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("DrinkSound") if PewPew ~= nil then PewPew:Play() end end
function gunUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,-.981,.196) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,.196,.981) end
function gunOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,-1,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) end
function isTurbo(character) return character:FindFirstChild("BoltHelm") ~= nil end
function onActivated() if not enabled then return end
enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
local reload = .2 --if (isTurbo(character)) then -- reload = .25 -- print("turbo") --end
gunUp() fire(lookAt) wait(reload) gunOut() wait(reload)
enabled = true
end
function onEquipped() --Tool.Handle.EquipSound:play() end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

local Tool = script.Parent; local myMouse = nil
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") if myMouse ~= nil then myMouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") if myMouse ~= nil then myMouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
myMouse = mouse
if Tool.Enabled then mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
